title: Adobe Unified Profile Service ExperienceEvent Shared Extension
description: Adobe Unified Profile Service shared extension. Contains Solution fields shared with other Solutions.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/profile/.title: Origin Dataset ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/profile/.description: Identity of the dataset that the Unified Profile Service ingested the data from. Usage is reserved for the Unified Profile Service.
